column1: kevin tucker| add a memorial kevin tucker
column4: 2015 in frisco. he was born on september 20
column6: arkansas to william joseph and reba cleo (cheney) tucker. kevin married jana marie lenton on august 26
column8: texas. he worked as a building supervisor in the construction industry. kevin was a member of the first united methodist church in frisco. he is remembered with love by his wife
column13: texas and rebecca tucker of frisco
column16: texas and numerous extended family and many friends. a memorial service will be held at 10:30 am on thursday
column18: 2015 at the first united methodist church of frisco with rev. cathy partridge and rev. bill meeks officiating. memorials
